website_summaries.verdict: A large and comfortable rocking chair. Measures approximately one and half times larger than standard rocking chairs, making this an excellent addition to a nursery.
pros: Large seat area means more room for relaxing, or for sitting with a child or pet by your side
The hardwood rockers give a smooth rocking motion
Polyester lining is comfortable and easy to clean
Neutral colors work well in any room of the house

customer_reviews.title: Buy it in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.text: We bought this chair right after having twins. It's the perfect rocking chair for our nursery; easy for us both to sit in it with a baby on our laps, or comfy for one of us to sit on with the girls on either side. Great for nursing too! It's soft; was easy to assemble; and rocks nicely on the hard wood and the rug we have it on. I would buy this chair again in a heartbeat. In addition, it's plain beautiful and classy! By the way, the picture makes the chair look short, but while sitting, I can lean my head back and it rests nicely on the seatback. (I'm 5'8)
customer_reviews.author: Megan Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rocker. Comfortable to sit on, looks great and I love how it can fit 2 adults with kids on lap. Works great for reading time! We had installed the legs the wrong way around, be careful of not repeating our mistake lol :) (Pictured)
customer_reviews.author: Simply in Control

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this chair, but not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The chair looks good over all but I'm just not in love with it. It must a typo in weight limit because 225lbs max load is not realistic for 2 adults and a baby. 225kg would be right. It's pretty snug to sit side by side with 2 adults for longer then a brief moment. It's hard to rock. The bow legs stick out pretty far in the back so I'm worry somebody will get foot under it. It's not super comfortable, little hard, armrests are minimal. It's more of single wide accent chair, for the price you can get something better.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this chair! I was almost deterred due to the negative comments, but I am so happy I went with my gut! It's the perfect size. Sure, it's a bit firm, but I feel the firmness is necessary to sit up comfortably when breastfeeding. I find it to be very comfortable. I also love that the rocking legs can be removed, so once it has finished its purpose for the babies, it can become a stylish living chair.
customer_reviews.author: GEM

customer_reviews.title: Get what ya pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's a nice rocker! But you definitely get what you pay for. There are just a couple spots where you can tell it's cheap. I agree with other reviews that say it's hard to rock, especially on carpet. It doesn't go back and fourth very far at all. But it was cheap, so considering that, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Elwood

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. Easy to put together. I am 9 months pregnant with twins and was able to do it by myself. Looks nice and feels nice. Doesn't rock super well, but serves it's purpose nicely. Looks wide enough to fit myself/my husband and our twins.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Green

customer_reviews.title: Good chair for a nursing mom and baby.
customer_reviews.text: Chair large enough for my daughter to nurse the new baby while the 2 year old sits next to her, It was easy to put together and turned on it's side is easy to get through doorways. The chair is comfortable, but I wish it had a little longer rocking distance. All in all would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Elsie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!! SIZE & COLOR
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical about buying this rocker for my nursery, but don't regret doing so! I love how wide the rocker is, fits two adults lol...
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Love this rocker!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about purchasing this product, am so glad I did! It is well built, took < 30 minutes to assemble! My husband built it...he is particular & was impressed, especially considering the price! One thing we are wondering is if they got the Intended Maximum Weight wrong? The manual states 225 lbs, when he assembled it, he said he would guess more like 500 lbs. Wondering if you mean 225 kg as max weight? Our combined weight is 290lbs, we sat, rocked, so comfortable and all seems fine! Highly recommend this wonderful little rocker and we think the intended weight is probably in kg, not lbs as published?
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Ham

customer_reviews.title: Will get the job done. Look great a few flaws but good price.
customer_reviews.text: Great chair. My husband and i bought it for our baby that is due in two months. The rocker is a lighter color in person than online but i actually like the color better in person. Rocking isnt really smooth but it will get the job done and you have to continuously push to keep it rocking. Both me and my husband are over 6 feet tall and the back is high enough. The weight max was a little concerning so we will just use it one at a time. The chair itself is comfortable and from the first time I sat on it I could feel myself falling asleep so i was clearly comfortable. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: keshkesh

customer_reviews.title: Very Difficult to Rock
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our toddler daughter’s room, as the two of us could no longer fit comfortably in her old glider chair. It was relatively easy to put together and took about 30 minutes. Some of the predrilled holes did not line up perfectly, but these just required a little more muscle to secure. The chair looks very nice in the space and is comfortable. However, as others have mentioned, it is very difficult to rock more than a few inches back and forth. Maybe it’s because we’re used to the ease of a glider or maybe it’s simply because the chair is so large, but we are disappointed that it barely rocks, even with a lot of force.
customer_reviews.author: ems25

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit! Wish I had bought sooner!
customer_reviews.text: So this is EXACTLY what I was looking for. The chair is oversized, without being huge...meaning, it fits in my nursery fabulously! It provides movement when wanted or needed, but otherwise sits like a chair with legs (I have it on a carpeted floor). I love the color (I purchased the grey), and feel it would go with most decor. Some reviewers commented on the short back...Im 5'3" and my head hits the back of the chair if I lean back. Truly wish I had purchased sooner. It was easy to sssemble, and will transition to a side chair nicely when my son outgrows it in hos bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda S Graham

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy this again
customer_reviews.text: It looks fine and does rock, but the rocking arches have flat spots where the screws are inserted that catch as you rock which makes it a bit difficult for rocking a baby to sleep. I also find myself feeling off balance when getting up from the chair while holding an infant due to how it is designed. The chair swings back heavily after getting up and hits the wall if it inched it's way back as I rocked. Investing in a high quality glider or genuine rocking chair is worth it. I wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Scrapbook22

customer_reviews.title: Great look, does not rock well
customer_reviews.text: I do like the look of this rocker, my husband and I are tall but smaller and size and we can squeeze into it together. I am not a fan of how it rocks though because it really doesn’t and is difficult to rock. I wish it was almost more like a glider but even a regular rocking chair rocks better. If it rocked better I would have put it in babies nursery but instead we have it in our living room just to sit in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit challenging to put together
customer_reviews.text: A bit challenging to put together. It took me a good hour and some to put together, but I did put it together alone so I know this didn’t help. The last two holes to connect the back to the arms was the most Challenging part for me. Follow the instructions to keep the other screws loose at first and it will be so much easier!!! The color is beautiful. The material is really nice. It’s a tad bit hard to rock on carpet, but I still love it. Glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only thing good is that it's wide. Slides everywhere. Does not really rock. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sturdy rocker for a fraction of the price you'd pay at buy buy baby.
customer_reviews.text: I got this rocker for my second child's nursery. It took me a bit to assemble and I needed to get some help from my husband because it was heavy and the holes weren't aligned perfectly, but once he snapped everything in place you'd never know I had to assemble anything. It's heavy, study, with durable fabric. The deep and wide seat make it comfortable enough to sit in, sleep in, and to cuddle my kids in. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Kamm

customer_reviews.title: Great for nursing twins!
customer_reviews.text: My babes are only 3.5 weeks old and so far this is the most comfortable place to nurse them because it provides enough back support but is still soft and I can lean my head back. It is wide enough that my toddler daughter can crawl up next to us. It doesn't rock a lot but allows some movement.
customer_reviews.author: swilson183

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't rock well.
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and wide as it says. My two children (3 and 6) and I can fit in the chair for reading at night which is what I wanted it for and to rock with them. However, it doesn't rock well on carpet in bedroom. It takes a lot of effort to rock it and you feel like you're barely moving. I wish I wouldn't have ordered it simply for the rocking disappointment and my daughters room is a little too small for this large chair.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Chair!
customer_reviews.text: I too was skeptical buying this chair online. Yes the holes were somewhat misaligned; however, here's a tip don't tighten all the bolts. Insert each bolt to get it started then shift to align each hole. It worked! I assembled during my lunch hour! This is such a great chair, perfect size for my small livingroom. I wanted a chair and a half and found this rocker. I switched out the rocker legs and added regular legs from Home Depot. It feels like linen so it may get dirty fast but just cover with throw blankets. I love it! It's more Taupe than gray.
customer_reviews.author: M.Ray

customer_reviews.title: I've had this almost 3 years. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Don't like the color but this has been awesome. I love that my husband could sit on it next to me while I fed the baby or read to her, etc. Now that my my first baby is older and we have another baby, I love that she can sit next to me when we read a book while the baby is on my lap. I knew I wanted a double wide and it has proven to be awesome. I do think having a small pillow for back support is a good Idea! And a neck pillow for middle of the night feedings!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Kain

customer_reviews.title: Great price, comfortable, quality material
customer_reviews.text: We love this chair. The size is perfect for mom, dad and baby, but would probably be too small if mom or dad is on the bigger side. Assembly wasn’t horrible and it seems like it will last awhile. Can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! It feels great on my back..especially with all those pregnancy pains. It is large enough to fit both me and my husband on.. We are snug but it's nice. Mostly, I wanted a spot where my pup could sit with me in the nursery. The chair is somewhat firm... So if you are looking for soft... It may not be the chair... It is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stach

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: - update, I notice the price of this chair has doubled since we bought it. I bought it at $148 and I thought that was a very reasonable price for the quality of the chair and that’s what my review was based on. ——- Very easy to assemble. Feels like great quality for the price. I love the super size of it.

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!!
customer_reviews.text: Putting it together was trying, but if you put the back bolts in first and not tighten them at all then get all your bolts THEN tighten them, works very well! Beautiful chair, Very comfortable! Love it! Price was very good as well!
customer_reviews.author: P. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Back Ache waiting to happen
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while to review this chair because I wanted to know if I would like it in the long term. When I first got the chair I liked the look of the chair and it seemed to set well. After having it for a few months the chair is ok. It sets to far forward to be comfortable and is not the softest thing in the world. Were it sets to far forward it hurts my back if I sit in it very long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pass.....
customer_reviews.text: fabric looked old and worn, leaned forward when sat in, not as comfy as it looks, not worth 220$!
customer_reviews.author: Nonstop

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent ! It sits both my husband and I! It's a lovely deep grey color and perfect in our nursery!!! It didn't take a long time to put together. Put it together in the room you intend it to go in because it is big and a little bulky to maneuver through doorways.
customer_reviews.author: P.J. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Just like I envisioned  it!
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful sturdy rocking couch. I can’t wait to use it to rock my baby. My only complain is the instructions. The manual says it takes 8 minutes to assemble. It is no where near that fast! Granted, I was alone and hugely pregnant. So that didn’t help. It rocks well and two people definitely fit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice quality. I assembled it by myself with my ...
customer_reviews.text: True to color, very nice quality. I assembled it by myself with my two year old in about half an hour, directions were very clear and included the tools you need. It is perfect for our nursery! However it does not rock very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Brittny H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't I got this chair for the price that I paid. It's comfortable and sleek. It's big but it's not too big. I rock my baby girl to sleep in it every night. My only complaint, which is minor considering all of the pluses, is that it scoots a lot and will require a rug under it if you have light colored hardwoods. It seats two adults comfortably as well!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not a long term option
customer_reviews.text: When I first started using this chair it was perfect —It was big and comfortable for me and baby. Fast forward to 3 months later— the cushion lost its comfort and now the chair has this annoying squeaky sound that wakes baby up when I’m trying to put him to sleep. I bought the chair to help me soothe my newborn to sleep instead it’s become an annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I liked the size of this chair
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size of this chair, and it was very easy to put together. My only complaint is that when you sit down on it, it leans forward a little much and doesn't rock very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall this rocket is great! Thankfully my husband is an engineer and was ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall this rocket is great! Thankfully my husband is an engineer and was able to correct the holes that were wrongly drilled and fix the problem. The chair took about an hour longer than necessary to assemble because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CHAIR!!!
customer_reviews.text: We can comfortably fit two adults or one adult and two toddlers plus baby. We got this to go in our 3rd child’s nursery so our two other kiddos can sit with us when we’re rocking the baby. It’s so pretty and comfy, would buy again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: This double rocker is very comfortable and looks good but is comes not assembled and ...
customer_reviews.text: This double rocker is very comfortable and looks good but is comes not assembled and make sure that you are skilled enough to put it together. 2 of the threaded parts needed some new metric nuts. Other then that my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: gregriga

customer_reviews.title: Not just for babies! 💁‍♀️🙌
customer_reviews.text: I don’t even have a baby. I bought this for my reading nook and it is the most perfectly comfortable, oversized rocking chair. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: cameoalexis

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Little comfortable for me but wife loves it. Was really easy to put together. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: RONNIE WESTBERRY

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the picture but the holes didn't line up when ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture but the holes didn't line up when putting together and the biggest issue is the rocker really only goes forward, it barely rocks backwards. Also the chair requires a lot of space in the room
customer_reviews.author: Maryna M

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, not to horribly heavy to carry the box up a flight of stairs..... recommend getting help
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer43

customer_reviews.title: Love this rocker
customer_reviews.text: Love this rocker! Got it for the nursery and it is perfect for me and my husband to sit in as we rock our daughter to sleep. I honestly can't say enough good things about it. It's comfortable, was easy to put together and the fabric is really forgiving, I have spilled breast milk and formula on it but it cleans right up and you can't tell
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Does not rock and squeaks from pre-assembled frame
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair so that my 4 year old could rock with the new baby and I. This chair does not rock and it squeaks from the frame. You can rock about an inch back and forth and it takes more force than comfortable. It is not squeaking in the areas of customer assumembly but in the back which came pre-assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Really doesn’t rock at all. I had high hopes for this chair and it’s a dud. Open to other suggestions!
customer_reviews.author: NLizak

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this rocker. We purchased it for our twins’ nursery and it is such a great addition. Plenty of room to fit an adult and two little ones. Great quality and so easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this double rocker. Now I can read with my toddler next to me without feeling squished in my old rocker.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable. Tilts forward and no padding on arm rests.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Anne

customer_reviews.title: Love, love!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size for me and my dog to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dee

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this item, which crushed me because I really wanted it. Was broken beyond repair.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Gooden

customer_reviews.title: arrived safe and best of all this chair is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This was shipped fast, arrived safe and best of all this chair is amazing. I have it as an accompaniment to my guest room and it is easily my new favorite spot in the house. Super cozy and I adore the fact it rocks
customer_reviews.author: Rayanne

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rocker. Fast Delivery, quick easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: No problems, fantastic customer service, Super fast delivery. This comfortable rocker was easy to assemble and is perfect for rocking a newborn to sleep with plenty of room. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Marietta GA Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This rocker is great. It's comfortable and sturdy. It is harder to rock since it's meant for two people.
customer_reviews.author: chandy

customer_reviews.title: Jury is still out on this one. The back ...
customer_reviews.text: Jury is still out on this one. The back isn't quite high enough for me. - I just wish it were higher. And I wish I could find the exact matching rocking ottoman. Is it out there? Haven't found it yet. . .
customer_reviews.author: smartworkingSunny

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does it’s job but rocking is weak and chair slides when you sit. Too lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Jennay

customer_reviews.title: I like the rocker
customer_reviews.text: I like the rocker, but it didn't go together right and we had to unscrew a piece and position it correctly before we could get it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size and quality but UGLY color
customer_reviews.text: Love the size. I have a newborn and a preschooler so this is a good fit for all of us. My only thing is the Taupe color is super ugly. Looks old/dingy in person. I wanted beige but it wasn’t available when I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Ciera Kinney

customer_reviews.title: My husband hated putting this together.
customer_reviews.text: Apparently, it's a lot of cheap, particle board and misaligned holes. It's not super comfy, I imagine once we break it in it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Shea

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in our nursery. Easy to put together, although the screws were all over the place when we opened the box. Thankfully, we were able to make sense of everything. Once we got it put together I was impressed. Great price and product.
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: Oversized Rocking Chair Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Took a risk and ordered this chair against some of the reviews. I LOVE it! The size is perfect, the back is high enough for me, and I don't find it too low. Mind you, I'm 5'4. I did buy a footstool at Ikea, so rocking is easier. My only complaint is that it slides back frequently, so I'm always having to pull it back from hitting the wall. Otherwise - oversized rocker perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Binz

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. Big enough for me and my husband or me and my two kids. Perfect for story time. I would like to get the ottoman as well.
customer_reviews.author: Janna Mason

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and sturdy. Looks great. My husband and I can sit snuggly together. Perfect size for the space we have.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyLM

customer_reviews.title: Great for twins
customer_reviews.text: I love this rocker. It looks great in my twin nursery (along with the matching ottoman) The My Brest Friend twin nursing pillow fits perfectly. For quick clean ups I just use my water based wipes and they are working just fine! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy.... best rocker!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best rocket I’ve ever used! Room for both my hubby and I.... I appreciate this product because we both can rock baby to sleep...
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Riera

customer_reviews.title: This was a great deal. Assembled very easy and seems good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal. Assembled very easy and seems good quality. It is not super comfy and doesn't rock well on carpet but for the price I still think it was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Bybee

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: Great rocker for a great price. Only problem is that to haven't figured out how to clean it. My son had the stomach bug and I still have water stains from the carpet and upholstery cleaner I used
customer_reviews.author: LC N

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy :(
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking but not very comfortable!? The cushions are very firm so you do not "sink in" to this rocker at all. It also seems to lean forward more than other rocker recliner type chairs we have had. The combination of firm cushions + the forward lean, makes me feel like I am going to fall right out of it!!?? Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kurz04

customer_reviews.title: Togetherness, you can’t beat it
customer_reviews.text: I love this rocker, my older grandson (6 yrs)can sit next to me while I feed his infant brother . It means so much to him to be close, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Davis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and quality for the price. Sure, it does slide on the floor but no more than any other rocking chair I’ve had. It’s not that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mummy7

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have is that you can’t really clean it without leaving a stain. Otherwise a great looking and comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Fernung

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this rocking chair
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this rocking chair. It was easy to assemble, was left right at my front door and it is super comfortable. I do not use it in a nursery, I use it in my living room. It fits myself (5'4 150 lb female) and my goldendoodle puppy perfectly. I would purchase this again a million times. I love the fact that it rocks and it just looks super clean and nice in my living room!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and looks like it will hold up pretty well
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Love this double rocker!
customer_reviews.text: Love this double rocker! I recently renovated my church’s nursery & bought this to replace 2 old rocking chairs. It was very easy to assemble, took about 15 minutes, and is quite sturdy. It also cleans fabulously, should anything get on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good chair but really hards to assemble. Thanks G-D for clever neighbors
customer_reviews.author: Syd

customer_reviews.title: We would buy this rocker again!
customer_reviews.text: We are really pleased with this product. Easy to assemble and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend at full price. Poor quality control.
customer_reviews.text: Screw holes not aligned correctly. Poor quality control. Cracked frame wood. Rocker legs slide easily on rug (fixed by using anti-skid rug strips). Would not recommend at full price.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with hole in fabric...no response from seller.
customer_reviews.text: We just received our rocker chair and set it up. The assembly wasn’t terrible, but we were very upset to see the fabric had pre-existing holes. I emailed the seller immediately and they have yet to provide a resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Yang

customer_reviews.title: Will not rock on carpet.
customer_reviews.text: As it was mentioned in some of the reviews it WILL NOT rock on carpet, at all!
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love this chair. Great quality, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It's a great chair but after taking it all out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great chair but after taking it all out of the box there's no instructions on how to build it. Plus getting in touch with them is not easy!!! They should really put these instructions online,
customer_reviews.author: ange1756

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for reading or snuggle-time. Good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful chair!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair so I could read with my baby daughter and it is wonderful! it’s big enough that she can move around a little and we can snuggle, it’s perfect. Comfy too!
customer_reviews.author: Stefy

customer_reviews.title: love it. Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: love it. Very comfy, but depending on personal preferences the rocking can be considered fine, or slightly difficult. Wish it came in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: holzauge

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the product
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it is better than I hope, it is sturdy and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Tsang

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS CHAIR!! everyone comes over loves this chair! I have it in my living room!! I wouldnt say it side enough for two larger adults comfortable but they can be cozy!
customer_reviews.author: Melissaann Rich

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and was easy to assemble, but it doesn't actually rock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: sits pretty low not very comfortable does not rock but... easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it's been wonderful for nursing my twins
customer_reviews.text: The chair does tend to slide across the carpet, but it's been wonderful for nursing my twins. :)
customer_reviews.author: Haley White

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Great chair. Very comfortable! Has a short rock to it but works great! Color is true to photo and it looks great in our nursery!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Not what we thought it was going to be. Very poor construction and trying to return this item has been the biggest hassle ever.
customer_reviews.author: William Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: I don't like that the arm rests are so low and that ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and on time. I don't like that the arm rests are so low and that the chair slides on the carpet. You're not able to rock back far but I guess enough to rock my son to sleep. I mostly enjoy the fact that I can now nurse my son and have my three small dogs on the rocker beside me and in the future if I have a 2nd child. I can have my son beside me, if he wants to spend time with me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Wide enough for my butt and 2 toddlers side by side
customer_reviews.author: Emma Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Returned because when I opened the box their was a crack in the wooden base rocker
customer_reviews.author: Rayner

customer_reviews.title: This rocker is great! It was easy for me to put together ...
customer_reviews.text: This rocker is great! It was easy for me to put together and it is quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda T. La Grone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I loveeeee this rocker. It’s great for the nursery and really comfortable. Easy setup and you won’t find a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kaia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! looks great in my daughter's room. It is very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Nore

customer_reviews.title: Cracked wood
customer_reviews.text: Love the rocker, it looks beautiful once assembled. Unfortunately one of the legs came cracked.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! Super easy to put together, big comfy, well designed. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but is very uncomfortable, hurts back due to seat being strange distance from back and rocker being placed forward so you can't lean back. Does not come with ottoman (separate purchase). I can't return so I'm actually giving the chair away for free because I don't want to charge anyone for such an uncomfortable chair. Save your money and your back- listen to bad reviews.
customer_reviews.author: phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for the money
customer_reviews.text: This chair looks exactly as pictured. It definitely doesn't rock easily and as others have already commented it leans forward when you sit on it. An easy cheap solution if you have it in a place you can't see the back of it is to attach heavy ankle weights to the back of rocking legs. It's definitely helped.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for nursing
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Taupe color is more gray than brown, which is what I wanted so perfect. I bought this after being so frustrated with a stork craft glider that was too narrow and arm rests too high to be comfortable for adjusting a breast feeding baby. This is perfect, A little stiff and the rock is pretty slight but it is perfect for nursing and reading books at night. Low arm rests and high back make it comfy, as for width easily fits grown adult and child
customer_reviews.author: emankcin

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This thing barely rocks. Building it was a pain. Not worth the money. Widenness is nice but that's about it. The chair is stiff on edges.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hovland

product_meta.title: Baby Relax Double Rocker, Dark Taupe
product_meta.description: Color:Dark Taupe| Style Name:Double RockerThe Baby Relax Hadley Double Rocker Chair is double the fun of your regular rocking chair! One and a half times as wide as a regular rocker, the Hadley allows you to relax comfortably on your own as well as enjoy spending quality time side by side with your little ones. This upholstered rocking chair is the perfect place to curl up for story time with your child! Featuring a sturdy construction and solid wood rocker feet, this rocker is sure to last through years of building memories with your family. The fabric and two-toned welting give this piece an upscale look that promises to complement décors of any style. The Hadley is plush and comfortable thanks to its thickly padded seat cushions and seat back! What are you waiting for? Your entire family will thank you for adding the Baby Relax Hadley Double Rocker Chair to your nursery or living room!
feature_bullets: Clean lines for a contemporary styling and sturdy construction.
One and a half times as wide as a regular rocker to provide you and your child complete comfort.
Features two-toned contrasting welting and espresso colored rocker feet.
Minimal assembly required. Available in multiple color options. 1-year limited warranty.
Product dimensions: 41.25"L x 34.75"W x 37.25"H. Seat dimensions: 33"W x 22"D. Weight limit: 225 lbs. Net weight: 69.85 lbs. Shipping dimensions: 55.75"L x 35"W x 17.25"H. Gross weight: 82.76 lbs.
